name: The Mourning Sea
description:
On a bright sunny day, you decide to peacefully fish in the sea. You throw your fish hook in the water and unexpectedly, catch a bottle with a paper inside. As you open it and read the message, you understand that it was purposely sent to you, bringing your buried demons to life. Then begins an adventure in which only you can discover what happened and hopefully find a way to inner peace.

The Mourning Sea is a short narrative game about fishing, poetry and self forgiveness made in 72h for the 108th Mini Jam.

Programming:

  • Munteanu Tudor-Gheorghe: https://xlandc.itch.io/

Game writing:

  • Elisa Corbeau: https://elisacorbeau.com/

Game art:

  • VoidOfCreation: https://voidofcreation.itch.io/

Sound design and music:

  • Joaquin Carcedo: www.cachitoestudio.com
